meanings.sent1: Turophiles enjoy trying different types of cheese.
meanings.sent2: My friends are all turophiles; they can't resist a cheese platter.
meanings.sent3: At the cheese festival, the turophiles were in their element.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for cheese made her a true turophile.
meanings.sent5: The turophiles' eyes lit up at the sight of the cheese wheel.

meanings.definition: Those who have a strong affinity for cheese.
meanings.sent1: The turophiles gathered to discuss their favorite cheese recipes.
meanings.sent2: As a turophile, he always carries a cheese knife in his bag.
meanings.sent3: The turophiles' cheese-themed party was a huge success.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the queen of turophiles in her neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The turophiles' dedication to cheese was unmatched.
